data.prayer: Spirit, defend the church in the state of Alberta against being inward-focused.
data.verse: The Spirit of the Sovereign LORD is on me, because the LORD has anointed me to proclaim good news to the poor. He has sent me to bind up the brokenhearted, to proclaim freedom for the captives and release from darkness for the prisoners.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Alberta, Canada
data.section_summary: What people or resources could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, you desire to blot out the sins of the people of Alberta, Canada. You said, if they turn to you, you will dissolve their sins like mist.
data.verse: I have blotted out, as a thick cloud, your transgressions, and, as a cloud, your sins. Return to me, for I have redeemed you.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 12 lost neighbors

data.prayer: God, we pray for the believers in Alberta, Canada to be generous so that they would be worthy of greater investment by you.
Father, remind your church in Alberta that they can know and depend on the love you have for them.
data.verse: We know and have believed the love which God has for us. God is love, and he who remains in love remains in God, and God remains in him.

data.prayer: Spirit, I pray that the Arab, Sudanese people will come and worship before you, Lord. May they glorify your name for you are great.
Father, please send new apostles into the harvest, who can open up new communities for the gospel in the state of Alberta, Canada.
data.verse: Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.prayer: Spirit, please give new believers a yearning to see you praised in Alberta, Canada.
data.verse: Declare his glory among the nations, his marvelous deeds among all peoples.

data.section_summary:
the state of Alberta, Canada has a population of 3,497,900.

We estimate Alberta has 272,384 people who might know Jesus, 2,217,452 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 1,008,064 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 12 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, please, raise up a generation of disciples in the state of Alberta who will make disciples who make disciples.

location.name: Alberta
location.cities_list: Calgary, Edmonton, Red Deer, Sherwood Park, Lethbridge
location.cities_list_w_pop: Calgary (1,019,942), Edmonton (712,391), Red Deer (73,593), Sherwood Park (70,618), Lethbridge (70,617)
